price: তোমালোকে ইয়াৰ গছ সৃষ্টি কৰা, নে আমি সৃষ্টি কৰোঁ?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
